title: Rotational kinetic energy - greatest value table

content.question:
Four systems are in rotational motion. Which of the following combinations of rotational inertia and angular speed for each of the systems corresponds to the greatest rotational kinetic energy?
Rotational InertiaAngular SpeedA<math alttext="I sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math><math alttext="omega sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>B<math alttext="I sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math><math alttext="4 omega sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>C<math alttext="2 I sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math><math alttext="2 omega sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>D<math alttext="6 I sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math><math alttext="omega sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems
